full_text: Wish administrators at CDC could be impeached for failing to release congressionally appropriated funds for ME research from 1988 to 1997. Scheme exposed but no one was even fired, including CDC Director who defended spending $ on “important” diseases like “measles”

full_text: About ten years ago I spoke at the EU to highlight the risk of zoonotic diseases being spread through wildlife smuggling. What’s the point in controls to manage travellers taking animal products across borders without an equally strong effort to stop smuggling. #WuhanCoronavirus https://t.co/pIKfvJ9VAa
